CustomField.description: Group name that should be displayed under the "Narrow Search" section of the PKB home page. The field named Root Category 2 must have a value that is a category in this group.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Group name that should be displayed under the "Narrow Search" section of the PKB home page. The field named Root Category 2 must have a value that is a category in this group.
CustomField.label: Category Group 2
